reviews.review: EIn muss für jeden gamer der was auf sich hält (zusammen mit den anderen teilen)
Its okay but HL2: Episode 2 or HL2 itself is better than Episode 1 in my opinion.
a great way to give the ending

Great next part to the story. I just sat down and played the whole thing in one sitting. The Half-Life story is fantastic and keeps you sucked in! I will go back into all the games later to finish collecting all the achievements.

Despite the very odd way of counting (Half-Life, HL2, HL2 E1, HL2 E2) the game is great and the dialogue is great. Just need to play Episode 2 and then HL: Alyx!

Valve does not disappoint!
A nice sequel after hl2, I recommend if you’re going for the full experience.
Otimo game, uma contiunacao simples porem boa.
meh gameplay, but good for contextual purposes in the story
Just as good as Half-Life 2. Only problem is how short it is. If you knew the route you could probably beat it and still have been able to refund it.

awful expansion that is so lazy that they reused the same maps from half life 2! don't believe me? if you pause the game and check what map you are on in this game, the map matches up exactly with the maps in half life 2! on top of this lazy design, the weapons suck and you are forced to play as a mute loser named gordan freeman the whole game. at least you can stare at alyx's ass the whole game and crank one out to get yourself through this muck. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS TRASH!
Не второй эпизод конечно,но поиграть стоит.

Проходится очень быстро. При выполнении ачивки "Одинокая пуля" я её прошёл менее, чем за 4 часа (то есть с использованием оружия это будет раза в полтора-два быстрее). Удивительно, что в эти 4 часа поместилось очень много.
Прошёл её дважды первый раз в нашей любимой песочнице Мод Гариса, второй раз по обычному
흡잡을데 없는 레전드 게임이 아닌가 싶습니다. 강추 또 강추입니다. 계속 또하고 또합니다.
i wish alyx would learn to Accelerated Back Hop and hurry the HELL [i]UP[/i]
this is a pain to play every half life marathon, but it's still half life

Первый эпизод Half-Life многие ругают за халтуру. 
Я с этим не согласен если честно. Первый эпизод хороший и интересный.

its cool cuz gordin isnt not kidnap no more, but saved. Him and his girlfrind alex escape city 16 but then the whole place goes boom and then its ended. Wow pretty good 9/10 the escort mission at the end is no good but its still fun

It's [b]quite[/b] short and a good transition into episode 2. Connects two big events together so this one doesn't have much going in terms of lore.
As for gameplay it's straight up half life, can't go wrong with that. Had some nice places for satisfying combat.
[b]Achievement hunters listen up:[/b]
Easy to get 100% achievements in this one. Could take you maybe 6 hours at worst if you do the story and then have to replay, which you won't have to if you follow guides carefully.
I mean, I beat the entire game once with just using one bullet, so....
half life 2: plundering in the citadel + city 17 destroyed
Хорошое но короткое продолжение первой халвы, также есть сюжет и прочее, думаю денег стоит (Рекомендую)
el half life 2 me gusto me tarde me tarde 2 semanas en terminarlo, el half life 2 episodio 1 me tarde 2 dias :v,estoy ansioso por jugar el capitulo 2

maybe i've just grown as a gamer. but replaying this game decades after it came out (yes for the achievements) it seems alot shorter then i remember it to be. maybe i just struggeled with the puzzles and enemies more. overall it's still enjoable though.
啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
最后一关打三脚机甲真让我蛋疼，早知道就应该保存多点火箭弹的
A very short, but fun expansion to Half Life 2's story. It hardly feels like a expansion but just the same thing(which is great mind you) but you need to have the second episode to go with it.
wish it was longer but still pretty good!
El lore de HL es increible. Obviamente es imperdible, compralo :cu
rispetto a half life 2 dura di meno ma grande gioco come sempre

Half-Life 2: Episode One é um DLC independente de Half-Life 2, começando exatamente após os eventos do final do game. As mecânicas são praticamente as mesmas, mas continuam divertidas. Se você jogou e gostou de HL2 e quer saber o que aconteceu depois, HL2EP1 é o jogo que você procura.
ITS HIGH QUALITY AND FUN YOU SHOULD TRY.

Great game, if you've played Half Life 2 this game is a must have. I would say to wait for a sale and get the Valve complete collection to get all of the Half-Life games and the other masterpieces that Valve has created. Would recommend this game.

It is a good story addition and makes a lot fun to play.

3 hours for all achievements in one run!
Good sequel, could be longer though

Half-Life 2: Episode One? More like, Half-Life 3 Part 1 amirite

sorry

Good game. Check out the whole series. I've done reviews on Black Mesa and HL2 and my comments are the same.

its ok its that the damage is bs like me on limited health a shotgun soldier will sneak up behind you blasting 2 shots doing 30-40 damage its already bad enough that it theres an apc i gotta destroy spamming rockets. pure bs but ok. this is on normal mode and its bs

Holy fuck do I dislike this game. It’s most definitely worth it if you’re a fan of Half-Life 2, and to understand Episode 2, but the gameplay in this one is boring and completely bullshit. Thank god it only took 4 hours. Again, play it if you like Half-Life, but don’t expect to have the same experience as the others.
It was suprisingly short, still fun though
I dislike this sequel to half-life 2 for its need to be stuck in a single spot for several hours and looking it up then so you finally know what to do here and what to do there
